statements: SELECT * FROM furniture_catalog
SELECT furniture_name, price FROM furniture_catalog WHERE category = 'Chair' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT furniture_id, furniture_name, category FROM furniture_catalog WHERE price < 500
SELECT furniture_name, description FROM furniture_catalog WHERE furniture_id = 3
SELECT * FROM furniture_catalog WHERE category = 'Table'
SELECT furniture_id, furniture_name, category FROM furniture_catalog ORDER BY category ASC, furniture_name DESC
SELECT * FROM furniture_catalog WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT furniture_id, furniture_name, price FROM furniture_catalog WHERE category = 'Chairs' AND price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT furniture_name, category, description FROM furniture_catalog WHERE category LIKE '%Table%' ORDER BY furniture_name ASC
SELECT * FROM furniture_catalog WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY furniture_id ASC
SELECT furniture_name, category, price FROM furniture_catalog
SELECT * FROM furniture_catalog WHERE category='Chair'
SELECT furniture_name, price FROM furniture_catalog ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT furniture_name, category FROM furniture_catalog WHERE price > 100
SELECT furniture_name, price FROM furniture_catalog WHERE category='Table'
SELECT furniture_name, category, price FROM furniture_catalog WHERE category = 'Chair' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, favorite_furniture_id, preference_level FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_level > 2 ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM furniture_catalog WHERE furniture_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT category, COUNT(*) as total_count FROM furniture_catalog GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT u.user_id, u.preference_level, f.furniture_name FROM user_preferences u JOIN furniture_catalog f ON u.favorite_furniture_id = f.furniture_id;
SELECT * FROM furniture_catalog;
SELECT furniture_id, name, price FROM furniture_catalog WHERE category = 'Chair';
SELECT furniture_id, name, category, price FROM furniture_catalog ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT name, category, price FROM furniture_catalog WHERE price > 500 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT furniture_id, name, category, price FROM furniture_catalog WHERE category = 'Table' AND price < 1000;
SELECT * FROM furniture_catalog WHERE category = 'Sofa' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM furniture_catalog WHERE price > 500 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT fc.name, fc.price, ur.rating FROM furniture_catalog fc INNER JOIN user_ratings ur ON fc.furniture_id = ur.furniture_id WHERE ur.rating >= 4 ORDER BY ur.rating DESC;

SELECT fc.name, up.username, ur.rating FROM furniture_catalog fc INNER JOIN user_preferences up ON fc.furniture_id = up.favorite_furniture_id INNER JOIN user_ratings ur ON fc.furniture_id = ur.furniture_id WHERE ur.rating >= 3 AND up.username = 'john_doe' ORDER BY fc.name ASC;

SELECT fc.name AS furniture_name, up.username AS user_name, ur.rating AS user_rating FROM furniture_catalog fc INNER JOIN user_preferences up ON fc.furniture_id = up.favorite_furniture_id INNER JOIN user_ratings ur ON fc.furniture_id = ur.furniture_id ORDER BY up.last_accessed DESC;
SELECT * FROM furniture_catalog;
SELECT name, price FROM furniture_catalog WHERE category = 'Chairs';
SELECT furniture_id, name, price FROM furniture_catalog ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT project_name, date_created FROM design_projects WHERE project_id = 500;
SELECT * FROM furniture_catalog WHERE category = 'Chairs';
SELECT furniture_id, name, price FROM furniture_catalog WHERE price > 500 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM furniture_catalog WHERE stock_quantity > 0 AND category LIKE '%Table%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT user_id, project_name, date_created FROM design_projects WHERE project_name LIKE '%kitchen%' AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_preferences WHERE preferred_category = 'Kitchen');
SELECT user_id, start_time, end_time FROM user_sessions WHERE user_id = 1234 AND CAST(end_time AS DATE) = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM furniture_catalog;
SELECT furniture_id, name, category FROM furniture_catalog ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM furniture_catalog WHERE price > 500;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM furniture_catalog GROUP BY category;
SELECT description FROM furniture_catalog WHERE furniture_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM furniture_catalog WHERE category='Chair' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM furniture_catalog WHERE price > 1000 AND category='Table' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT description FROM furniture_catalog WHERE name LIKE '%Sofa%';
SELECT user_id, preferred_style FROM user_preferences WHERE preferred_color='Blue';

SELECT users.username, orders.order_date, furniture_catalog.name FROM users JOIN orders ON users.user_id = orders.user_id JOIN furniture_catalog ON orders.furniture_id = furniture_catalog.furniture_id ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
